mapper.update:
/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.product.repository.master.PdProductColorDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE PD_PRODUCT_COLOR
prdt_no = #{prdtNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prdt_color_code = #{prdtColorCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_yn = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR},
rgster_no = #{rgsterNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgst_dtm = #{rgstDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
moder_no = #{moderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mod_dtm = #{modDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE prdt_color_code = #{prdtColorCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND prdt_no = #{prdtNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
